channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Some flu measures decline, but it's not clear this severe season has peaked
item.description: U.S. flu infections showed signs of a slight decline last week, but health officials say it is not clear that this severe flu season has peaked.
